message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value to us at $1,000,000, reflecting its unique features and benefits. We believe it could be an excellent addition to your collection or business, offering immense value at $800,000. Let's discuss how we can make this opportunity mutually beneficial. Looking forward to your response.

Alice, your product is fantastic, but unfortunately, my budget for this kind of investment is capped at $800,000. I'm very interested in this deal, but that's the maximum I can offer right now. If you're willing to consider this price, I'm ready to move forward. Let's see if we can find a mutually beneficial solution.
